name: Kristina Sheli - Induratize (Offical Music Video) [4P001, 4PAWS Records]
description:
“Induratize” is a one-take song about a typically disordered, modern times relationship. It’s a picture of long-time dumbed feelings and confused personalities bound in useless fights and wasted emotions. It portraits two people who neither accept nor respect the other’s beliefs and decisions. It's about a hardened heart, resistant to the original idea of love.

The song features a heavy threaded groove, a mystical combo of dark synth lines and clean, icy vocals. The lyrics are written unconventionally, frameless, genderless and abstract, in Kristina Sheli’s characteristic style. “Induratize” is the first independent release on 4PAWS Records (Cat. No. 4P-001). 

Written-by: Kristina Sheli
Artwork & Design-by: Sasha Scherdin
Executive Producer: Rob Lange

4PAWS Records
